A careless developer reused a prime key while encrypting two secrets with RSA. Both ciphertexts are yours: 424293883908111029047022327152907760188170105710752318679458029396542113953601834358882674821039571606808005231271341806009982121591321006698184939844433945778795941410935557001520764429579580546469411984732275914809565862297660232. Find the hidden message!

The flag format is flag{...}
n=456186391671453502049733046688753732818730063316639264601223515492995720445897392132251852104160219220882238543617409178549845246392297769161389362158427672993962434396699582420893158879916445818085586854714281060109965576575570721, e=281515500384630564428213481196152332827568687023776331728999771457419347735746593892184143073322739847382360389727131220045967408975757264030638120891259250563614698314806309421396669745669000413423712614000403901808215690703044829

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{bshjooyq}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 424293883908111029047022327152907760188170105710752318679458029396542113953601834358882674821039571606808005231271341806009982121591321006698184939844433945778795941410935557001520764429579580546469411984732275914809565862297660232
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=456186391671453502049733046688753732818730063316639264601223515492995720445897392132251852104160219220882238543617409178549845246392297769161389362158427672993962434396699582420893158879916445818085586854714281060109965576575570721, e=281515500384630564428213481196152332827568687023776331728999771457419347735746593892184143073322739847382360389727131220045967408975757264030638120891259250563614698314806309421396669745669000413423712614000403901808215690703044829
extra_info: p=21358520353045374337938600269905372094268386565957296025429711018778445130998762968198198605964220478683563243251439, q=21358520353045374337938600269905372094268386565957296025429711018778445130998762968198198605964220478683563243251439, Ï†(n)=456186391671453502049733046688753732818730063316639264601223515492995720445897392132251852104160219220882238543617366461509139155643621891960849551414239136220830519804648722998855601989654448292149190457502352619152598450089067844
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
